name: Central Library
description: The main resource center for academic materials, research, and quiet study.

name: Student Canteen
description: Serves fresh meals, snacks, and beverages. Located near the Bus Stop.

name: Physics Lab
description: Equipped for general physics experiments and practicals. Find the lab on the first floor.

name: Chemistry Lab
description: Facilities for inorganic and organic chemistry practical sessions.

name: Communication Lab
description: Dedicated space for soft skills and professional communication practice.

name: Computer Lab
description: Open access computers for student use, programming, and project work.

name: MBA Department
description: Offices and classrooms for the Master of Business Administration program.

name: BEEE Lab
description: Basic Electrical and Electronics Engineering laboratory.

name: Principal Office
description: The central office for the college head, managing academic and administrative decisions.

name: Administration Office
description: Handles student admissions, records, fee payments, and general institutional inquiries.

name: S&H Lab
description: Dedicated laboratory for Science and Humanities practical sessions and foundation courses.

name: IGC Office
description: The International Graduate Center office, managing foreign collaborations and higher study guidance.

name: IAS Academy
description: Training center offering coaching and resources for students preparing for civil service examinations.

name: Boys Hostel
description: On-campus residential facility for male students, located near the medical center and dining.

name: Football Field (Athletic Track)
description: The main playing area for football, surrounded by an athletic running track.

name: Cricket Turf
description: Central ground featuring a professional turf wicket for cricket matches and practice.

name: Girls Hostel
description: Residential accommodation for female students, located near the Guest House and main campus facilities.

name: Open Auditorium
description: Large open-air venue used for college events, functions, and large-scale gatherings.

name: Project Room
description: A dedicated workspace for students to collaborate on engineering and academic projects, located **near the Main Block entrance**.

name: EP Lab
description: Engineering Physics laboratory, primarily used for first-year engineering practicals, located **near the Main Block entrance**.

name: R&D Cell
description: The Research and Development cell, supporting faculty and student innovation and research work, located **near the Main Block entrance**.

name: Volley Ball Court
description: Outdoor paved court for volleyball matches and recreational student play.

name: Placement Training Cell
description: The office managing campus recruitment, soft skills training, and placement preparation workshops, located **near the IAS Academy**.
